metadata.name: Solace 01
metadata.description:
A light emitting material is mapped on an array of 360 squares resembling a layered and twisted torus-like shape.

The array spins around it's tilted vertical axis while the pattern of the material follows a 360 degrees eccentric rotation movement within each square, thus creating the illusion of perpetual motion.

The piece is made by combining 360 individually rendered frames into a 12 second looping animation.

1200x1200 MP4 File
